main.name: Aiman Afzal
main.occupation: Fullstack / Backend Developer - working remotely for more than two years
main.description: A self learner and eager to learn more. A Fullstack/Backend Developer, Blockchain lover and I love to write microservices for serverless architecture.
bio: I, being a Certified Blockchain Developer and a FullStack developer working as a Senior Lead backend Developer - WIRD PBC - Remote using NodeJS,ExpressJS, Python, ReactJS, and AWS (EC2, Lambda Functions, REST API, RDS, S3) and Firebase.

Along with that, I am Deep Learning Certified for AI based developments working as a Software Engineer (Backend) and a key team member with team aiming towards AI based predictions to make a business successful using NodeJS, Python, Shopify and Google Analytics.

Worked as a Remote software engineer for a company situated in USA (Arizona) as a full stack developer, managing the current running softwares and writing code to extend the current features using NodeJs and AWS (EC2, Lambda Functions, REST API, RDS, S3).

Have been associated with multiple companies for more than 5+ years which includes my responsibilities as development and management of their software and databases, all based on web and desktop using ASP.NET (.NET and NodeJs)
and opensource environment which includes JQUERY, JavaScript, AngularJS, Node.js, AWS, Firebase and HEROKU.
Developed Financials, Advertisement, Sales and Hospital related custom ERP

text: I Know Ayman Afzal from Past Couple of Years. He is Very Honest and Hardworking Professional.
It was Fun and Supportive to have him as in our Team. His Deliverables were on Time and he is get going type for taking up new Challenges and Tasks.
There has been Times when he came up with Solutions and Suggestions of various tools.
He is Always Ready to take Tasks and Help Others being a very good and Active Team Member.
I recommend him for Sr backend Programming Roles and Responsibilities.
He has a very Good Learning Curve for new Technologies, Languages and Good at analytics.
I wish him Great success for his Future endeavors

Ayman according to me is a intelligent and hardworker kind of guy. He always showed great skills and knowledge when it comes to any challenging work or problem. Ayman has good coding skills which proves credibility towards programming. I wish him all the best in his future endeavors.
testimonials.user: Syed Shahzaib Ahmed - Software Engineer and Lead IT
